name: wallet
description: This directory holds the wallet implementation

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development dotenvx run -f .env.development -- nodemon --exec "node --loader ts-node/esm" src/app.ts
scripts.dev:debug: NODE_ENV=development dotenvx run -f .env.development -- nodemon --exec "node --loader ts-node/esm --trace-deprecation --trace-warnings" src/app.ts
scripts.dev:verbose: NODE_ENV=development dotenvx run -f .env.development -- nodemon --exec "node --loader ts-node/esm --trace-deprecation --trace-warnings --trace-uncaught" src/app.ts
scripts.build:trace: npm run clean && node --trace-deprecation --loader ts-node/esm -p . && tsc -p .
